WorkItem.Description: 2.2.5 load ok but 2.2.6 at the same time at the same machine dont load from armory! what changed?

Comments.Message: Nothing changed, as far as I know. What character? Sure you're entering the details correctly? If you've had it work on 2.2.5, then there should be no network problems.
I am having this issue as well as of a few days ago.  It is happening with all characters that I try to look up.

Well, let me explain again in more detail, since people have understanding issues.

2.2.5 and 2.2.6 are at same machine, same network, same OS, same everything, running at the same time, loading same char from armory, 2.2.5 loads it OK, but 2.2.6 don´t load at all.

2.2.5 loads info on welcome screen, 2.2.6 don't, etc.

Hint to developer, I´m behind router and firewall, but since 2.2.5 works ok in this environment 2.2.6 should work too, than I ask again, what changed about internet/network access from 2.2.5 to 2.2.6?
Yes, I can.  Checked with all characters to be sure, and to verify the realm spelling as well.
Muka, do you have the proxy settings setup the same on both 2.2.5 and 2.2.6? Shait, did you ensure you have your proxy settings setup as well?
Also, you may have some sort of client-side firewall that you need to explicitly open a hole in for each version of the application.
I have never had to set up Proxy settings.  This has not happened before (as with the OP), and worked fine before.
Same problem i had when 2.25 appeared. my fix - and i'm now using 2.2.5 and ONLY 2.2.5 - was to delete ALL files relating to ALL versions of RAWR, then do a complete fresh install.

No proxy setting at all on both versions.

2.2.5 and 2.2.6 contents were extracted and rawr.exe executed with no configuration.

Well, I started 2.2.6 today and it worked, wondering why it did'n worked before and why it's working now! LOL
This exact issue is happening with me. Same everything at my end, but 2.26 will not load from armory. 2.25 is fine.
